shadow.name: ARROGANCE
shadow.thought_pattern: I know what's right. Everyone needs to listen to me.

gift.name: LEADERSHIP
gift.description: Natural authority that emerges through embodiment
gift.thought_pattern: I lead by being. My presence is my influence.

siddhi.name: INFLUENCE
siddhi.description: Divine will expressed through human form
siddhi.thought_pattern: I am moved. Others are moved through me.

True leaders don't need to announce themselves. When you force your voice, you reveal your insecurity. Lead by embodying what you speak.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Notice when you're pushing to be heard. Drop the volume. Feel the authority beneath the force.

experiment.hypothesis: If I stop forcing my voice and embody my message, my influence will increase.
experiment.action: For 7 days, speak only when invited. Demonstrate first. Notice who asks for your input.

success_criteria.target: Others seek your guidance without you pushing
